title: The Royal Jelly
description: A delicate synthetic softbait embossed with your personal coat of arms, so the fish will have the honor of knowing who's catching them.

title: The Nyarlathotep
tag: Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn.
description: Enchanted by select verses from the Necronomicon, this multi-tentacled softbait with glowing LED eyes allows you to call upon the unspeakable horrors unleashed by the Outer Gods to enhance your fishing prowess, but at a hefty spiritual price.  Battery not included.

title: The Schr√∂dinger
tag: Warning: fish caught using this bait may suffer waveform collapse.
description: This high-tech plastic softbait uses the principle of quantum superposition and random subatomic events to nudge the state of a fish from 'uncaught' to 'caught'.
